attributes.action: Reduce student loans by 0.4% over the year in line with RPI for all students starting University in 1998 or after
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: March's Retail Price Index (RPI) inflation figure was revealed as MINUS 0.4% last March. So from September, student loans should be reduced by 0.4% over the year for all students starting University in 1998 or after.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
